Package com.echsylon.atlantis

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Atlantis.TokenHelper
    This interface describes the token helper feature set.
    Atlantis.TransformationHelper
    This interface describes the API offering means for preparing a request either for the real world or the mock environment.
    MockRequest.Filter
    This interface describes the mandatory feature set to provide a request template.
    MockResponse.Filter
    This interface describes the mandatory feature set to provide a mocked response.
    MockResponse.SourceHelper
    This interface describes the mandatory feature set to provide a data stream for content described in the given text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Atlantis
    This is the top level orchestration layer, on top of the mock web mockServer, that will serve the mock responses.
    Configuration
    This class contains all request mockRequests the Atlantis local web server will ever serve.
    Configuration.Builder
    This class offers means of building a configuration object directly from code (as opposed to configure one in a JSON asset or file).
    HeaderManager
    This class is responsible for keeping track of any header key/value pairs.
    MockRequest
    This class contains the full description of a request that should get a mock response.
    MockRequest.Builder
    This class offers means of building a request template directly from code (as opposed to configure one in a JSON file).
    MockResponse
    This class contains the full description of a mock response.
    MockResponse.Builder
    This class offers means of building a mocked response configuration directly from code (as opposed to configure one in a JSON file).
    SettingsManager
    This class holds user configured server behavior.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JsonException
    This instance of a runtime exception represents an error caused while parsing JSON data.
